description: Episode number 4 of Series "The Skills of Defensive Driving". Made for the Department of Transport, this film shows distractions both inside and outside the car, tiredness, "highway hypnosis", and alcohol - as the major causes of head-on collisions. Explains how these can be avoided. Suitable for upper secondary level.
